post.body: Happy 2009 - Social Media Events Calendar - Enjoy -http://tinyurl.com/a3vtz5
justin.tv is fantastic...
love the modern world.. watching new year's party live in Brazil and waiting for the local new year's party...
Lamb was delicious now ready for grape mousse
Happy New Year everyone @ #snowmageddon
I wonder if #snowmageddon is turning in #rainmageddon
chicken lasagna is in the owen... yummy...
"Remember, the magic of Christmas lies in your heart" - Ho, ho, ho from Canada
Following Santa - http://www.noradsanta.org/en/home.html
big party 2night, celebrate Christmas with friends in Oakville #snowmageddon
took me 2 hours to clean 6 driveways, snow is so wet that even the snowblower was clogging #snowmageddon
I love Christmas time... and I love to walk in the snow in #snowmageddon
Holidays around the World - http://tinyurl.com/9u2gof/holidays/christmas
I'm making my grandpa a web 2.0 person... cheers Grandpa
when I first got my Toshiba Tecra 4 years ago it was fast, now Windows XP takes arpund 2 minutes to open Firefox or IE...
we like when Ahmed says: "guitar guy, guitar guy", before he sings "Jingle Bombs"... fun
Watching Jeff Dubham.
Retweeting @noradsanta: I think we're ready, on the 9th day of Christmas, my true love twit-pic'd to me________________ ?
